comment: * An implementation of {@link android.util.Property} to be used specifically with fields of type * float. This type-specific subclass enables performance benefit by allowing * calls to a {@link #setValue(Object, float) setValue()} function that takes the primitive * float type and avoids autoboxing and other overhead associated with the * Float class. * * @param The class on which the Property is declared.

methods.name: public abstract void setValue(T object, float value)
methods.comment: * A type-specific variant of {@link #set(Object, Float)} that is faster when dealing * with fields of type float.

methods.name: public final void set(T object, Float value)

methodNames: public abstract void setValue(T object, float value)
public final void set(T object, Float value)
